data.title: Equipment for accessibility â€“ Hattingen (Ruhr) station
data.meta_description: Get specific information on the equipment features for accessibility of our platforms.
data.text:
The equipment features listed below serve to ensure barrier-free accessibility to the platforms.

If you have any questions, please contact our mobility service by phone 030 65212888 (local rate) or by email at msz@deutschebahn.com. Our colleagues are available for you from 06:00 to 22:00 Monday through Friday and from 08:00 to 20:00 on Saturdays, Sundays and holidays.

Please select a platform to learn which accessibility features are met.
